name: part_007
file: tmp_【Birthdayお披露目】かわいいけどかっこいいを目指していくヴァ！！【#ときのそら生誕祭ライブ 】 [AtbVQjUesq4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Tokino Sora talks to the audience about fulfilling her promise to sing again.
MC section: Introduction of the song 'Ai Kotoba IV'.
Performance of the song 'Ai Kotoba IV'.

subtitles.original: Hey! ありがとう!
subtitles.english: Hey! Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい! はい!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 着地点は いつだって
subtitles.english: The place I land is always

subtitles.original: 君のその笑顔
subtitles.english: that smile of yours.

subtitles.original: 遠回りしたけど出会えたんだ
subtitles.english: I took a long way around, but I finally met you.

subtitles.original: 一緒 一緒でしょ
subtitles.english: We're together, we're together, right?

subtitles.original: きらめく希望のメロディー描いて
subtitles.english: Drawing a melody of sparkling hope,

subtitles.original: 夢に会いに行こう
subtitles.english: let's go to meet our dreams.

subtitles.original: 無数の星屑の中
subtitles.english: Among countless stardust,

subtitles.original: 見つけてくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: thank you for finding me.

subtitles.original: 大切なキミへいつの日でも
subtitles.english: To you, my precious one, no matter the day,

subtitles.original: 一番に届けよう
subtitles.english: I'll deliver this to you first.

subtitles.original: 見てて 私 ここで歌い続けること
subtitles.english: Watch me, I will keep singing here,

subtitles.original: 約束するから
subtitles.english: I promise you that.

subtitles.original: みんな!
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 約束通り、また歌ったよ!
subtitles.english: Just as I promised, I sang again!

subtitles.original: ありがとう!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: キミの声を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice

subtitles.original: 近くで
subtitles.english: from close by.

subtitles.original: 道を照らす月のように
subtitles.english: Like the moon illuminating the path,

subtitles.original: (ずっと ずっと ずっと)
subtitles.english: (Forever, and ever, and ever)

subtitles.original: ハッピーエンドのファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The fanfare of a happy ending,

subtitles.original: 一緒に叶えよう
subtitles.english: let's fulfill it together.

subtitles.original: 見たことのない世界へ
subtitles.english: To a world never seen before,

subtitles.original: ステップ踏んで飛び出そう
subtitles.english: let's step out and fly away.

subtitles.original: 笑顔と笑顔が重なって
subtitles.english: When smiles overlap with smiles,

subtitles.original: 虹が架かるように
subtitles.english: like a rainbow appearing.

subtitles.original: 夢と夢がギュッと重なる瞬間を
subtitles.english: The moment dreams overlap tightly,

subtitles.original: 奇跡と呼ぶんだ
subtitles.english: we call it a miracle.

subtitles.original: 行こうよ ユメゾラの向こうへ
subtitles.english: Let's go, beyond the dream sky.

subtitles.original: さあ!
subtitles.english: Now!

subtitles.original: こちらもホスフェスで歌った曲です!
subtitles.english: This is another song I sang at HosuFes!

subtitles.original: 愛言葉IV!
subtitles.english: Ai Kotoba IV!

subtitles.original: みんなも盛り上がっていってね!
subtitles.english: Everyone, get excited with me!

subtitles.original: 贈呈なんてしてなかった現状
subtitles.english: The current state where I hadn't given anything,

subtitles.original: 君もそう思った？
subtitles.english: did you think so too?

subtitles.original: 最高で止まらないように更新したい
subtitles.english: I want to keep updating so it doesn't stop at the best,

subtitles.original: 叶えたい夢まであとどれくらい
subtitles.english: How much longer until the dream I want to fulfill,

subtitles.original: 誰も行ったことがない場所へ
subtitles.english: to a place where no one has ever been?

subtitles.original: 辿り着くまでは僕ら止まれない
subtitles.english: Until we reach it, we cannot stop.

subtitles.original: 多分しつこいけどどうかよろしくね
subtitles.english: I'm probably persistent, but please bear with me.

subtitles.original: ねえねえ たまに めーめー
subtitles.english: Hey hey, sometimes 'meeh meeh',

subtitles.original: 僕だけじゃ作れないもの
subtitles.english: something I can't create by myself.

subtitles.original: 僕とか君とか私とか恋とか愛とかまとめて全部
subtitles.english: Me, you, I, love, affection, everything all together,

subtitles.original: 君がどこかに行っちゃうとかありえないよ
subtitles.english: it's impossible that you would go somewhere else.

subtitles.original: 君がくれた音に弾けた火花
subtitles.english: The sparks that burst from the sound you gave me,

subtitles.original: 「はじめまして」からずっと恋しちゃってるんだよ
subtitles.english: I've been in love with you ever since our first meeting.

subtitles.original: 君のいない未来考えられないよ
subtitles.english: I can't imagine a future without you.

subtitles.original: これから先もふたりがいいな
subtitles.english: I want the two of us to be together from now on too.

subtitles.original: 一途になるほど冷えたくもなったよ
subtitles.english: The more earnest I became, the more I wanted to cool down,

subtitles.original: 散々な僕のこと呼んでくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: thank you for calling out to someone as terrible as me.

subtitles.original: 君のいない未来考えられないよ
subtitles.english: I can't imagine a future without you.

subtitles.original: これから先もふたりで
subtitles.english: From now on, the two of us,

subtitles.original: それがいいじゃん
subtitles.english: that would be nice, wouldn't it?

subtitles.original: もっと膨らんでくストーリー
subtitles.english: The story keeps expanding more and more,

subtitles.original: 感傷やけに凹んじゃって
subtitles.english: feeling sentimental and unusually depressed.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫求めすぎは野暮
subtitles.english: It's okay, asking for too much is unrefined,

subtitles.original: 終わんない愛の連綿どーでしょ
subtitles.english: how about a continuous love that never ends?

subtitles.original: ねえねえ おいで めーめー
subtitles.english: Hey hey, come here, 'meeh meeh',

subtitles.original: 僕が君にできること
subtitles.english: what I can do for you,

subtitles.original: まだまだまだあるけど
subtitles.english: there's still much more,

subtitles.original: 驚かせたいからないしょなんだ
subtitles.english: but it's a secret because I want to surprise you.

subtitles.original: 君の愛がいつも勝っちゃうこと
subtitles.english: That your love always wins,

subtitles.original: 許さないよ
subtitles.english: I won't allow that.

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!
